接口的使用
org.springframework.validation.MessageCodesResolver

  • 使用MessageCodesResolver的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.validation
    Provides data binding and validation functionality, for usage in business and/or UI layers.
    org.springframework.web.bind.support
    Support classes for web data binding.
    org.springframework.web.reactive.config
    Spring WebFlux configuration infrastructure.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation
    Annotation-based setup for Spring MVC.

      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Default implementation of the MessageCodesResolver interface.
      返回MessageCodesResolver的org.springframework.validation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MessageCodesResolver AbstractBindingResult.getMessageCodesResolver()
      Return the strategy to use for resolving errors into message codes.
      参数类型为MessageCodesResolver的org.springframework.validation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Set the strategy to use for resolving errors into message codes.

    • org.springframework.web.reactive.config中MessageCodesResolver的使用

      返回MessageCodesResolver的org.springframework.web.reactive.config中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected MessageCodesResolver DelegatingWebFluxConfiguration.getMessageCodesResolver() 
      protected MessageCodesResolver WebFluxConfigurationSupport.getMessageCodesResolver()
      Override this method to provide a custom MessageCodesResolver.
      default MessageCodesResolver WebFluxConfigurer.getMessageCodesResolver()
      Provide a custom MessageCodesResolver to use for data binding in annotated controller method arguments instead of the one created by default in DataBinder.
      MessageCodesResolver WebFluxConfigurerComposite.getMessageCodesResolver() 

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation中MessageCodesResolver的使用

      返回MessageCodesResolver的org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected MessageCodesResolver DelegatingWebMvcConfiguration.getMessageCodesResolver() 
      protected MessageCodesResolver WebMvcConfigurationSupport.getMessageCodesResolver()
      Override this method to provide a custom MessageCodesResolver.
      default MessageCodesResolver WebMvcConfigurer.getMessageCodesResolver()
      Provide a custom MessageCodesResolver for building message codes from data binding and validation error codes.
      MessageCodesResolver WebMvcConfigurerAdapter.getMessageCodesResolver()
      已过时。 
      Provide a custom MessageCodesResolver for building message codes from data binding and validation error codes.
